levels.description: Immediately fires a compressed liquid nitrogen cannon, dealing <@ba.vup>{atk_scale:0%}</> Arts damage in an area and pushing enemies away <@ba.vup>moderately</>; For <@ba.vup>{duration}</> seconds, enemies hit by this ability take <@ba.vup>True Damage</> proportional to distance traveled; <@ba.rem>If the Reserve Water Cannon is located within 4 tiles around her, it will also activate this ability</>
